issue.title: DRC Vehicle can't make sharp turns

content.raw:
Just tried it out using gazebo_models pull request 25 and the vehicle does turn sharper, but also fishtails a lot more and is less consistent.  I ran an automated program in which the vehicle perform various trajectories and recorded the results.  

It is worth noting that we did not use the latest vehicle plug in and instead used a modification which made it behave like an older version.  The steering wheel angle is directly set instead of specifying a force.  We will try out the new vehicle plugin soon.  Don't think this difference should change the vehicle's kinematics...
